DataElement.preferredName: Curative Definitive Treatment Complete Year Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the year in which the curative definitive treatment was complete.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.__The treatment plan for a disease or disorder that has been chosen as the best one for a patient after all other choices have been considered._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.:The treatment plan for a disease or disorder that has been chosen as the best one for a patient after all other choices have been considered.

Concepts.definition: Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.
The treatment plan for a disease or disorder that has been chosen as the best one for a patient after all other choices have been considered.

Property.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:The act of administration.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated for TCGA and released per approval from T.Lichtenberg. mc 11/9/12

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Something that happens at a given place and time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
